description:
Automatically handle horizontally overflowing content by placing it in a NeonSwiper component allowing for smooth
horizontal scrolling with all input devices.

props.name: fade
props.description: Display fade in / fade out styling when there is an overflow.

props.name: orientation
props.description: Swiper orientation, i.e. whether to manage overflow horizontally or vertically.

props.name: hideFadeStart
props.description: Hide the starting fade (left or top depending on the orientation).

props.name: hideFadeEnd
props.description: Hide the ending fade (right or bottom depending on the orientation).

slots.name: default
slots.description: contents of swiper with which to apply overflow scrolling.
